title: Remco Evenepoel smashes back into the stripes with emphatic time trial victory
content:
Evenepoel swaps road for time trial world title, with Filippo Ganna in second and Josh Tarling snatching bronze. Brandon McNulty fourth.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel smashes back into the stripes with emphatic time trial victory on Velo.
author: ahood
